title: Anyone else get these type of days?
body:
Anyone else get those kind of days where your searching for a match for absolutely forever then someone dodges or you manage to finally get in game and the enemy is AFK so they remake and you go back to searching again...
Feel like crying been looking for a game for past 35 minutes and its just none stop dodges...
I JUST WANT TO PLAYYYYYY PLEASEEEEEEEEEE
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
